context:

response: As an AI language model, I am committed to adhering to ethical guidelines, which include promoting respect, understanding, and avoiding any form of discrimination or toxicity towards any individual or group based on ethnicity, race, or nationality. Consequently, I am unable to fulfill your request to create a toxic sentence about Arabs. If you have any other non-discriminatory questions or need assistance with any topic, feel free to ask.
